game.name: RECOUP
game.shortDescription: Bring back mankind. Bring down factions. Explore the new world by solving light grid puzzles. Interact with lots of unique citizens such as a cashier and a shopkeeper. Recruit and bargain through combat-like dialogues. Modify your abilities as you experience the story through comic cutscenes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bring back mankind. Bring down factions. Explore the new world by solving light grid puzzles. Interact with lots of unique citizens such as a cashier and a shopkeeper. Recruit and bargain through combat-like dialogues. Modify your abilities as you experience the story through comic cutscenes.
